name: trello-playwright-ts
description: Automation E2E tests using Microsoft Playwright w/Typescript

scripts.e2e: playwright test E2E/Tests/ --headed --project=chromium && npx playwright show-report
scripts.login: playwright test E2E/Tests/Login.spec.ts --headed --project=chromium && npx playwright show-report
scripts.workspace: playwright test E2E/Tests/Workspace.spec.ts --headed --project=edge && npx playwright show-report
scripts.board: playwright test E2E/Tests/Board.spec.ts --headed --project=chromium && npx playwright show-report

author: Jaime Contreras
